page.title: 17SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: There are 200 pupils and 9 teachers. We start at 9.15 a.m. and finish at 3.45 p.m. with an hour for dinner and two playtimes of 15 minutes. Subjects taught are {Maths, English, Welsh, {Science, Nature, Geography, History, {Art, Craft, Scripture, P.E. and {Swimming.}School dinner costs Â£3 a week. Many have free meals or bring a packed lunch. We wear grey uniforms with a maroon tie with grey stripes. Some children are taught to play a brass, woodwind or string instrument by visiting teachers. Every Friday different Junior classes arrange the school assembley. Recently we had a computer and the children in the top class use it. Annual events are{ {Sports, Swimming Gala, Christmas {Dinner,}and{St. Davids Day Concert. The school motto is Ceisio Canfod Cynnal - SEEK DISCOVER RETAIN.
